location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 41 of 1833 from David Anderson Blane, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire, to Charles Norris, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the detention of Sa‘īd bin Sultān Āl Sa‘īd's (the Imam of Muscat) wife, and rumours that the Prince-Governor of Fars, Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mirzā, has designs on Bussora [Basra].
